string.text:
If turned on, Focus will drain your stamina. 
 
 Your Focus will stop if your stamina is too low. 
 
 You need at least some stamina to start Focusing.
Only works if Stamina Drain is on. Higher values mean stamina drains more quickly when Focusing. \n \n Default: 1.0
Higher values mean more zoom when you Focus without a weapon in your hands. \n \n Default: 1.0
Lower values bring the weapon sight/scope closer to you when you aim and Focus. \n \n Default: 1.0

Higher values mean more zoom when you aim your weapon and Focus. 
 
 Works for most weapon sights. Does not work for 2D scopes. 
 
 Default: 1.0
